ygData.subject: Re: War and Peace
ygData.msgSnippet: You heard our alley, Screamed Motormaster to Triggerhappy s calling. Seeing Dead-End and Drag Strip head off he turns to the rest of them. All right boys,

Subject: Re: War and Peace
From: Robert Dahl <rdahl@...>

"You heard our alley," Screamed Motormaster to Triggerhappy's calling.
Seeing Dead-End and Drag Strip head off he turns to the rest of them. "All
right boys, show em what Decepticons are made of". With that Motormaster
sees the two missiles from Ratchet coming towards Wildrider. He transforms
into his Semi mode, and pulls around so his trailor takes the missiles
shots. Scratching his side "lets do it" Motormaster yells, and starts his
engine and drives towards Triggerhappy. Wildrider jumps forward and
transforms to car mode following Motormaster. Speedbreaker fire twice at
Ratchet, (if he hits it wont cause damage, it will just screw up youre
mechanics, like making youre gun not work or something, you can choose what
it does if it hits.

The Missile hits Beastbox who falls off Squawktalk with a hole in his
chest. As he falls he looks around nervously. He lands on the ground hard.
"OWWWW, Beastbox make you pay for that. He leaps forward with quick speed
and jumps towards Sideswipe, trying to land on him.
